::Killfest/Scyther/Greven/Demise/EndBringer::

Killfest nods, walking past Diamond and entering the pod, looking 
around the inside.

"They might just be able to fit," he says, ripping several chairs out 
and throwing them on the ground.

"Demise, you and Scyther get in the cargo hold. Greven, you and me 
will be in here with the pilot."

He frowns, looking at Diamond as Demise and Scyther walk over to the 
cargo hold, Demise cramming himself in and Scyther getting in after 
him.

"EndBringer will have to hold on to the shuttle for the ride. Will 
the shuttle be able to take the weight?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> She looked at the horde of fiendish looking bots. She smiled. This 
> looked like a crew that she could get along with. She looked up at 
> Killfest and smiled, showing her fangs slightly. "This is the only 
> pod that I could get. And it's a long walk back so I suggest that 
we 
> get as many of you inside. I will come back for those who can't fit 
> on this trip." She looked Killfest up and down. She liked him. He 
> appealed to her reptile side. "Hold on a nano second."
> 
> She walked into the pod and dumped the crates that were in the 
cargo 
> hold of the pod. She walked back out and looked at Killfest. "I 
have 
> made a little more room in here. Get you and those who can fit 
inside 
> and I'll have to come back for the rest."
